page.title: 16THE LOCAL GARAGE.
page.content:
{RHUALLT HILL GARAGE}stands alongside the present route of the A55 road,at the bottom of the hill(ref.751073), and opposite the school.The owners are the Jones brothers whose family have run the garage for many years.
Apart from selling petrol, the garage also offers servicing facilities, A.A. approved, both in the garage workshop and at the workshops across the road. There is also an M.O.T.service.
A recovery facility is available for all types of vehicles, very convenient for some who find the gradient of Rhuallt Hill a little too taxing on either brakes or engine, the Hill being the scene, and the occasional cause of, a number of traffic accidents.
